name: QLPreviewingController
desc: A protocol for implementing a custom controller to create previews of files.

items.name: func preparePreviewOfFile(at: URL, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Prepares the preview of a file at the specified file’s URL.

items.name: func preparePreviewOfSearchableItem(identifier: String, queryString: String?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Prepares the preview for a file by using the data from Spotlight’s searchable item.

items.name: func providePreview(for: QLFilePreviewRequest, completionHandler: (QLPreviewReply?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Prepares the preview of a file identified within a file preview request.
